com.ccjk.cybex.barcodegen.print.printer

Class PrinterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ccjk.cybex.barcodegen.print.printer.PrinterController

  • public class PrinterController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Divish on 4/16/2016. This is our major class for delaing with the printing It has the following function It holds the current status of the printer Holds the instance to the singleton ZebraPrinter Object Provide helper functions for dealing with the ZebraPrinter and Printer Connection Get a Printer Connection from ConnectionManager Open a the Printer Connection and fetch the ZebraPrinter instacce Sending an image for printing Update the listeners of printer status like UI Test the connection and printed and keep the printer status updated so that other classes can react accordingly. Like stop sending images if paper is out Close the connection Holds Printer status string and colors for each type of status

      • status

        private static int status
        Status of the printer obtained from testConnection() Can be STATUS_WAITING - No Jobs in PrintJob object STATUS_PRINTING_PAUSED - printer is paused at hardware level. Frequetly resolved by "Resume" on the printer STATUS_PRINTING_NO_PAPER - printer is out of paper STATUS_PRINTER_NO_CONNECTION - connection could not be created or connection is not responding question ConnectionManager STATUS_PRINTING_ERROR - Misc error during printing STATUS_WAITING_FOR_BUFFER - hardware buffer on printer is full. Any attempt to send more images will lock the printer to my experience. Best option is to wait a certain time and perform connection test again STATUS_HEAD_OPEN - printer head is open STATUS_RIBBON_OUT - printer cannot detect ribbons STATUS_HEAD_TOO_HOT - printer will stop printing at device level if the head is hot.You should not send images to buffer while the printer is still reporting this error STATUS_READY - REady for print or already printing, but in any case, everything is alright STATUS_NO_PRINT_THREAD - Personal Error of application. The has died

        Parameters:
        status -

      • testConnection

        public static void testConnection()
        Test Connection to the printer and the printer itself. It will retrieve the status from the device and save it in the field status. Note that this operation can be slow so try to limit to increase speed This method is typically called on a loop from PrintThread at a regular interval.

      • updateStatusListeners

        public static void updateStatusListeners()
        Update Ui listeners of changes in printer status

      • closeConnection

        public static void closeConnection()
        Close the Printer Connection. Very important to close as only one connection can remain active to a printer at any time. Also perform a connection close after any connection error before trying to reconnect again

      • openConnectionIfNeeded

        public static void openConnectionIfNeeded()
                                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                          com.zebra.sdk.printer.ZebraPrinterLanguageUnknownException
        Open the Printer connection and fetch the ZebraPrinter instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        com.zebra.sdk.printer.ZebraPrinterLanguageUnknownException

      • createConnection

        public static void createConnection()
        Get Printer Connection from the ConnectionManager. Note that the connection is not opened yet and the ZebraPrinter instance has not been obtained

        Pause printing manually.

      • sendImageToPrint

        public static void sendImageToPrint(java.awt.image.BufferedImage imagee)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Send an image to print. Cannot send too big image due to limitations of device memory Not that the image has to be exactly the size of the label to avoid automatic resizing on printer side
        Parameters:
        imagee -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
